title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5502.3 - Nonpayment of toll
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5502.3 - Nonpayment of toll

State Regulations

Toll must be tendered all in lawful U.S. currency or all in
lawful Canadian currency. The evasion, nonpayment, payment in other than such
currency, payment of less than the full amount (except for applicable fiscal
year volume discounts), or other failure to comply with the toll rate schedule
for any reason is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5502.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
